data.name: Songs of Conquest - Supporter Pack
data.detailed_description:
Have you fallen in love with our game, or just really want to support the development of Songs of Conquest and wear a badge to prove it? Perhaps you just really like raising the dead and commanding armies of talking frog people?

If any of the above is true, then the Supporter Pack is for you. This treasure trove is filled to the brim with riches and trinkets in the form of cosmetic add-ons such as:

  • Unique main menu badge to show those philistines they’re being conquered by royalty
  • Wielder pets that accompany your first Wielder hero units on their adventures in every game
  • Two additional team colours: pink and dark. For those who wish to slay in style

    Important note: By buying this DLC, you are first and foremost showing your support for the development of Songs of Conquest and for us, the developers. These riches and treasures are to help you woo your allies and throw shade on your opponents!

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
